featured.text: Google, which already uses prototypes of such cars to ferry its staff along Californian freeways, once put a blind man in a prototype and filmed him being driven off to buy takeaway hamburgers.
When blinded, they can quickly regain the ability to see.
If the research proves successful in humans, some of the nearly 40 million blind people worldwide may one day have a tiny, striped fish to thank. 43.
Children born blind never see anybody smile, but they show the same kinds of smiles under the same situations as sighted people.
A blind man can get into a car and travel safely.

definition.en_def: Unable to see; lacking the sense of sight.
definition.example: The dog guided the blind man safely across the street.
